title: President to meet Ruling Party MPs today (30)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A special discussion will be held on Monday (30) between President Gotabaya Rajapaksa and the ruling party’s parliamentary group.
The General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Podu Jana Peramuna Sagara Kariyawasam stated that the discussion will be held at the President’s Office at 5.00 P.M on Monday (30).
